field.name: summary
field.value: CacheProvider will never be stopped when using ActiveRecord --> program will not exit and process keeps running

field.name: description
field.value:
When using a second level cache like NHibernate.Caches.MemCache the Castle.ActiveRecord.Framework.SessionFactoryHolder causes the NHibernate.Impl.SessionFactoryImpl to starts the CacheProvider. But it never causes the NHibernate.Impl.SessionFactoryImpl to STOP the CacheProvider.
So that in case of memcache we need to manualy call the "Memcached.ClientLibrary.SockIOPool.GetInstance("nhibernate").Shutdown();" function otherwise the SockIOPool thread keeps running and if we close our application the process keeps running!

comment.author: mzywitza
comment.text: If you add any contribs (Castle, NH, etc), you are responsible for cleaning up yourself. Only contribs included in AR sharedlibs folder are supported by us.
